MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Ivanhoe Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.17am. Our engineers have arrived Hillhead substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.32am on Tuesday 16th February 2021
